#summary flash([key])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

Gets the value of a specific key in the Flash (or the entire flash as a struct if no key is passed in).

*Return Type*:

Any

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *key* || string || false ||   || The key to get the value for ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<p><cfoutput>#flash("message")#</cfoutput></p>
}}}
